00072     RMLPositionFlags(void)
00073     {
00074         this->SynchronizationBehavior                       =   RMLFlags::PHASE_SYNCHRONIZATION_IF_POSSIBLE ;
00075         this->BehaviorAfterFinalStateOfMotionIsReached      =   RMLPositionFlags::KEEP_TARGET_VELOCITY      ;
00076         this->BehaviorIfInitialStateBreachesConstraints     =   RMLPositionFlags::GET_INTO_BOUNDARIES_FAST  ;
00077         this->EnableTheCalculationOfTheExtremumMotionStates =   true                                        ;   
00078         this->KeepCurrentVelocityInCaseOfFallbackStrategy   =   false                                       ;
00079         this->PositionalLimitsBehavior                      =   RMLFlags::POSITIONAL_LIMITS_IGNORE          ;
00080     }

00103     inline bool operator == (const RMLPositionFlags &Flags) const
00104     {
00105         return(     (RMLFlags::operator==(Flags))
00106                 &&  (this->BehaviorAfterFinalStateOfMotionIsReached
00107                         ==  Flags.BehaviorAfterFinalStateOfMotionIsReached)
00108                 &&  (this->BehaviorIfInitialStateBreachesConstraints
00109                         ==  Flags.BehaviorIfInitialStateBreachesConstraints)
00110                 &&  (this->KeepCurrentVelocityInCaseOfFallbackStrategy
00111                         ==  Flags.KeepCurrentVelocityInCaseOfFallbackStrategy));
00112     }
